title: India Juggles Growth, Budget Deficit as Global Risks Mount
description: India’s finance minister unveiled a relatively cautious budget on Sunday, focusing on economic stability in the face of rising global risks.
content: India’s finance minister unveiled a relatively cautious budget on Sunday, focusing on economic stability in the face of rising global risks.
